400.description: The request was malformed or invalid. Please check the request parameters.

401.description: Authentication failed or user lacks proper authorization.

403.description: You do not have permission to access this resource.

404.description: The requested resource could not be found on the server.

422.description: Oops! We couldn't process your request due to errors in the provided data. Please review and correct the input.

500.description: An unexpected error occurred on the server. Please try again later.
